About community

About our community
About our community

American Presidential Estates & Capitol Hills are an opportunity to become part of a manufactured home community of families who care about their homes, their neighborhood, and their neighbors.

A place where you will feel happy and relaxed. We created a community that you would be proud to come home to.

If you are sick and tired of paying rent without building any equity; if you are fed up with not having enough room; if you have decided that you and your family deserve better, and if you are committed to do something about it.

Then we invite you to visit the Manufactured Home Communities of American Presidential Estates & Capitol Hills and see what we created for Michigan families who deserve the best.

We’re not just another mobile home park. Сheck this out!

The entire community has a true residential neighborhood feel and not that old style mobile home / trailer park look. You see it and so do your guests.

Our features

Some of the features that our Homeowners have told us were important to them in making their decision to buy a Manufactured Home in American Presidential Estates and Capitol Hills.

  • Safety

    The local police and fire departments consider American Presidential Estates & Capitol Hills to be quiet and peaceful neighborhoods.

  • Bus stop

    We have in a in-community bus stop that picks up children to The Lincoln Consolidated School District. It’s just 10 minutes away.

  • Leisure

    Stocked fishing pond, picnic & nature area, tennis, basketball, roller courts, 3 separate park and play areas with playground equipment including an under 12 play park, Golf Courses and other actives to allow you to maximize your leisure time

  • Lakes

    Near Ford & Belleville Lakes with public access boat launches and one launch just a 0,5 mile away, park and beach areas.

  • Friendly curbs

    We created a neighborhood with curb appeal. They are low enough for easy movement around the area.

  • Amenity

    That all sites have off and on street parking, metered city water & sewer, weekly curbside trash, recycling, and yard waste pick-up

  • Management

    On site management to address your concerns promptly and a 24 Hour Emergency Line

  • Personal address

    Having an actual address and not just a lot number

  • 24 hour emergency service

    Text about emergency service

Why people chose American Presidential Estates & Capitol Hill

Community News and Events

Contacts and Local Numbers
of interest

City sewerage

All our houses are connected to the
city sewerage and water supply

Care about neighborhood

We care about keeping the neighborhood looking its best. It’s the way of living and doing business that will help keep resale values high.

Location

Being only 2 miles from I-94, people enjoy the fact that we are centrally located to major employment centers, Houses of Worship, shopping areas, and recreational activities.

Testimonials

Happy Tenants words

Rene T., retiree

"When I retired I moved to Florida. But soon after I realized that I missed my family and friends so I decided to move back to Michigan, for at least part of the year. I needed a home that would be low maintenance and affordable. A former co-worker friend of mine told me about American Presidential Estates and how she liked living there. I stopped by and spoke to Jenifer in their office; she was very helpful and informative. I saw a house I liked and bought it. Since moving in to the Community the staff has made me feel like I was part of their family while being close to my family."
